tool_description: Parses recipe text to extract structured ingredient lists with quantities, units, and preparation methods for nutritional analysis.

recipe_text.description: Complete recipe text including ingredients and instructions

recipe_name.description: Name or title of the recipe

serving_count.description: Number of servings the recipe produces

error_messages: Invalid recipe format: Recipe text must contain identifiable ingredients with quantities. Ensure proper formatting with ingredients listed clearly.
Missing serving information: Serving count must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Parsing error: Unable to extract ingredient information. Check that ingredients are listed in standard format (quantity, unit, ingredient name).
usage: Input complete recipe text with recipe_name and serving_count. The tool identifies ingredients, quantities, units, and cooking methods for further nutritional analysis.

total_servings.description: Number of servings the recipe produces

units.description: Measurement units for each ingredient quantity

cooking_methods.description: Cooking methods identified in recipe instructions
